song.title: Yesu Nataka Kutakaswa Sana
song.englishTitle: Lord Jesus, I Long to be Perfectly Whole

verses.refrain: Mweupe tu, ndipo mweupe, Ukiniosha nitakuwa safi.
verses.verse: Yesu Mwokozi ili nitakaswe, nataka moyo uwe enzi yako. Ukiangushe kilichoinuka unioshe sasa niwe mweupe.
Bwana Yesu sasa unitazame, unifanye niwe dhabihu hai; Najitoa kwako, na moyo, vyote; unioshe sana niwe mweupe.
Bwana kwa hiyo nakuomba sana, nakuongojea miguunie pako, Wanaokuja hutupi kamwe, unioshe sasa niwe mweupe.
